digest

public byte[] digest()
Completes the hash computation by performing final operations such as padding. The underlying digest is reset after this call is made.

Returns:
the array of bytes for the resulting hash value.
See Also:
MessageDigest.digest()

resetDigest

public void resetDigest()
Resets the underlying digest for further use.
